questions_and_notes: consider replacing "where land" with "where vegetation" so that when regridding we get a more accurate report of precipitation onto the canopy.  (I presume canopy is found only where vegetation.)  Should this be "where vegetation over land"?
cell_methods: area: mean where land time: mean
comment: The precipitation flux that is intercepted by the vegetation canopy (if present in model) before reaching the ground.
